sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_project_effort"> <u_project_effort action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_created_by>Krishna.Raj</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2025-03-21 10:32:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7a8611a3c314221052237405e40131a0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>Athul</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2025-05-21 07:51:51</sys_updated_on> <u_additional_comment/> <u_approval>requested</u_approval> <u_date>2025-03-19</u_date> <u_end_time>2025-03-19 18:25:41</u_end_time> <u_number>PE0001087</u_number> <u_other/> <u_project_name display_value="Blessing ITSM Project">51ca3392c308221052237405e4013194</u_project_name> <u_project_work>Story : To modify the Catalog item Workflow - Created catalog task - Created a Display BR to generate scratchpad  - Created a client script calling scratchpad to make variables read only and mandatory - Created a UI policy to display variables in our task</u_project_work> <u_remarks/> <u_resourse display_value="Krishna Raj">16b594e58381e650a946f896feaad3e0</u_resourse> <u_start_time>2025-03-19 11:00:24</u_start_time> <u_work_hour>7.42</u_work_hour> <u_work_notes/> </u_project_effort> </record_update>
